Title: First they came for the mango Juul. And I did not speak out because I did not have a sweet tooth. Th...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: First they came for the mango Juul. And I did not speak out because I did not have a sweet tooth. Then they made the age limit 21. And I did not speak out because I was not a child. Then they came for my vape. And there was no one left to speak for me.
